  • MPs & MLAs
  • Rajasthan
  • 15th Assembly (2018 to 2023)
  • Sachin Pilot
This MLA is a Deputy Chief minister. Ministers represent the government in debates, so we do not report their participation. They do not sign the attendance register, ask questions, or introduce private member bills. Data corresponds to the period from 17-12-2018 to 02-08-2023. (Attendance not available for 22 Sep and 23 Sep 2022.)
